list_definition.definition: one of the mass of thread-like objects that grow from the skin

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He brushed the dog’s hairs off his jacket.

list_definition.definition: the mass of these, especially on a person’s head

list_ex_of_english: He adjusts his clothing, he tends to his hair, with infinite loving pains.
Most of the hairs arise from little creamy white dots, some of which are enclosed in small round black or bluish grey spots.
They dyed their hair and wrote slogans on their clothes and on city walls.
He clearly found running the shrine very stressful: he lost weight and his hair started to fall out.
He was only 5 feet 3 inches tall with a dark complexion, hazel eyes, and dark hair.
A combed skein of hair forms the background to the smaller images, which explains the curious criss-crossing in the crook of the swimsuited woman's arm.
Her hair was arranged in a bun with her front hair parted in the middle.
The characteristics were : hair, facial hair, larynx, voice, figure, height, skin, hands/feet, muscularity, chin, nose, jaw, speech, and gestures/movement.
